innhold.avsnitt: For the father or co-mother, we include income earned during the period the mother is receiving her parental benefit, right up until the father or co-mother starts their parental benefit period.

The father or co-mother must have had income in six of the past ten months before they start their parental benefit period. If you choose to start your period of parental benefit by postponing for a period of time, you must meet the income requirements when you apply for postponement.
